ActivityGroup.10100.1:
[Event Notes]
The event: Daring Adventure! The Ghost Ship Haunts the Deep has begun!

During the event, you can challenge limited-time stages, read event stories, and play the mini-game Lucky Treasure Shovel.

Completing these activities and event missions will reward you with event currency: Squid Rice Crackers, which can be used to redeem various rewards.
ActivityGroup.10101.1:
[Event Notes]
The [Guild Sweet Guild] event has begun!

During the event, you can challenge limited-time levels, read main stories, and play the mini-game Cookie Workshop.

Completing these activities and event missions will reward you with event currency: Glass Marbles, which can be used to redeem various rewards.
